Bash(python -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect(''pokoton.db'')
cursor = conn.cursor()
cursor.execute(''SELECT name, start_date, end_date FROM sprints LIMIT 5'')
results = cursor.fetchall()
for row in results:
    print(f''Sprint: {row[0]}, Start: {row[1]}, End: {row[2]}'')
conn.close()
")
